mapper.select:
SELECT aa.* FROM ( SELECT a.pdtSeq , a.pdtTypeCd , a.pdtBrandCd , a.pdtName , a.pdtAccidentCd , a.pdtYear , a.pdtMonth , CONCAT(a.pdtYear,'/',a.pdtMonth) xpdtYearMonth , a.pdtRunKm , a.pdtColorCd , a.pdtPrice , a.pdtRecommendCd , a.pdtRegDt , a.pdtUdtDt , a.pdtDelNy
ORDER BY a.pdtSeq DESC LIMIT 99999999999 ) aa LIMIT #{pgRowCount} OFFSET #{pgOffset}

SELECT a.pdtSeq , a.pdtTypeCd , a.pdtBrandCd , a.pdtName , a.pdtAccidentCd , a.pdtYear , a.pdtMonth , a.pdtRunKm , a.pdtColorCd , a.pdtPrice , a.pdtRecommendCd , a.pdtRegDt , a.pdtUdtDt , a.pdtDelNy FROM product a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.pdtSeq = #{pdtSeq}

SELECT a.pdtBrandCd , b.cdcName pdtName , CONCAT('(',COUNT(*),')') xpdtGroupCount FROM product a LEFT JOIN code b ON b.cdcSeq = a.pdtBrandCd WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY a.pdtBrandCd , b.cdcName ORDER BY a.pdtBrandCd
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.pdtDelNy = 0
mapper.sql: SELECT a.mbrSeq , a.mbrName , d.pdtTypeCd , e.cdcName xpdtTypeName , d.pdtBrandCd , CONCAT('[', f.cdcName, ']') xpdtBrandName , d.pdtName , d.pdtAccidentCd , g.cdcName xpdtAccidentName , d.pdtColorCd , h.cdcName xpdtColorName , d.pdtYear , d.pdtMonth , d.pdtRunKm , MAX(CASE WHEN j.pdiBack = 0 THEN j.pdiUrl END) xpdtImgF , MAX(CASE WHEN j.pdiBack = 1 THEN j.pdiUrl END) xpdtImgB
JOIN code e ON e.cdcSeq = d.pdtTypeCd JOIN code f ON f.cdcSeq = d.pdtBrandCd JOIN code g ON g.cdcSeq = d.pdtAccidentCd JOIN code h ON h.cdcSeq = d.pdtColorCd JOIN productimg j ON j.pdtSeq = d.pdtSeq
, d.pdtTypeCd , e.cdcName , d.pdtBrandCd , CONCAT('[', f.cdcName, ']') , d.pdtName , d.pdtAccidentCd , g.cdcName , d.pdtYear , d.pdtMonth , d.pdtRunKm
mapper.select:
, c.pdtSeq , c.buyDateTime xDateTime , c.buyPrice pdtPrice , c.buySeq FROM members a JOIN memberpayment b ON b.mbrSeq = a.mbrSeq JOIN productbuy c ON c.paySeq = c.paySeq AND c.buyDelNy = 0 JOIN product d ON d.pdtSeq = c.pdtSeq AND d.pdtDelNy = 0
WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.mbrSeq = #{shSeq} GROUP BY a.mbrSeq , a.mbrName , c.pdtSeq , c.buyDateTime , c.buyPrice , c.buySeq
ORDER BY c.buyDateTime DESC, c.buySeq

, b.pdtSeq , b.wshSeq xwshSeq , b.wshDt xDateTime , d.pdtPrice FROM members a JOIN productwishlist b ON b.mbrSeq = a.mbrSeq AND b.wshDelNy = 0 JOIN product d ON d.pdtSeq = b.pdtSeq AND d.pdtDelNy = 0
WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.mbrSeq = #{shSeq} GROUP BY a.mbrSeq , a.mbrName , b.wshSeq , b.wshDt , d.pdtPrice
ORDER BY b.wshDt DESC, b.wshSeq
SELECT COUNT(*) xpdtCount , SUM(b.pdtPrice) pdtPrice FROM productwishlist a JOIN product b ON b.pdtSeq = a.pdtSeq WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.mbrSeq = #{shSeq} AND a.wshDelNy = 0
